item.title: Candace add a quote by Bessie Anderson Stanley
Candace add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "Make your own Bible. Select and collect all the words and sentences that in all your readings have been to you like the blast of a trumpet." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Candace add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "Sometimes a scream is better than a thesis." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Candace add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "There is a time in every man's education when he arrives at the conviction that envy is ignorance; that imitation is suicide; that he must take himself for better, for worse, as his portion; that though the wide universe is full of good, no kernel of nourishing corn can come to him but through his toil bestowed on that plot of ground which is given to him to till. The power which resides in him is new in nature, and none but he knows what that is which he can do, nor does he know until he has tried." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Candace add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "Whoso would be a man must be a nonconformist." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Candace add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "Peace cannot be achieved through violence, it can only be attained through understanding." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson
